about_the_game:
This asset collection features a variety of fantasy items designed to meet the standards of "RPG Maker MZ" and "RPG Maker MV."
It includes high-quality version images at 3000x3000px, as well as mini-icons in 32 items,7 different sizes, totaling 671 types. Additionally, UI images such as simple frame and gauge are included as a bonus!
Feel free to edit these images as needed, making them perfect for tiling sets and ParallaxMap. Enjoy the flexibility and unleash your creativity with these assets!

*******************************************
Contents
High quality images (3000 x 3000px): 32 items (some with color and angle variations, total of 671 types).

Icons with borders (24px×24px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (32px×32px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (48px×48px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (80px×80px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (100px×100px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (144px×144px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons with borders (256px×256px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)

Icons without borders (24px×24px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (32px×32px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (48px×48px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (80px×80px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (100px×100px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (144px×144px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)
Icons without borders (256px×256px): 32 items (671 sheets including differentials)

Bonus UI images: 14 types

*******************************************


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
